Teacher Support

Change the Story will provide face-to-face and online training opportunities for teachers. We are currently trialling a short online course which encourages teachers to dig beneath the surface of the climate crisis and explore the underlying causes. If you would like to take part in the trialling please get in touch.

The European Commission support for the production of this website does not constitute an endorsement of the contents which reflects the views only of the authors, and the Commission cannot be held responsible for any use which may be made of the information contained therein.
